definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: The Cullinan rising at West Kowloon waterfront with world-class design and prestige.
sentences.chinese: 天玺矗立西九龙海畔，世界级设计尽显尊尚气派。

sentences.english: This is the opulence of the twin suites layout… a temple of your supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 豪华双套房设计，彰显豪迈气派，倍添矜贵身价。
公主殿下气派非凡地来了。

sentences.english: Mr. King liked the lordliness of giving largess.
sentences.chinese: 金先生喜欢慷慨赠予的贵族气派。

sentences.english: Elegant design lines and luxurious style, showing the effect of superior.
sentences.chinese: 优雅线条外观设计豪华气派，展示效果出众。

sentences.english: The external design and stylish interior epitomises presence and luxury.
sentences.chinese: 外部与内部气派的设计体现了它的仪态与豪华。

sentences.english: This was the antiquated elegance of his day.
sentences.chinese: 这是他那时代古老的高贵气派。

sentences.english: It must be sturdy and durable yet stylish.
sentences.chinese: 但是它必须坚固耐用的气派。

sentences.english: Only the Sorbonne district still retains the venerable air of a famous institution.
sentences.chinese: 只有索尔邦校区中，还保留一分古老名校的典雅气派。

sentences.english: She tried to cultivate an air of sophistication.
sentences.chinese: 她竭力养成一种老于世故的气派。

sentences.english: This Barolo reflects the most typical style of the wines virtuosity and aristocracy.
sentences.chinese: 该款酒表现出了典型巴罗露酒的艺术和贵族气派。

sentences.english: The family owns a lordly mans ion.
sentences.chinese: 那个家族拥有一座气派的大厦。

sentences.english: His manner reeks high position with high pay.
sentences.chinese: 他的气派表现得好像是个高官厚禄的人物。

sentences.english: Boris was elegantly dressed, though his get-up was of a style appropriate to active service.
sentences.chinese: 鲍里斯穿着雅致，一副剽悍英武的气派。

sentences.english: Sumptuous hotel lobbies, highlight-star hotel luxury style.
sentences.chinese: 富丽堂皇的酒店大堂，彰显星级酒店的豪华气派。

sentences.english: Made in imported corium , comfortable and durable, style and honored.
sentences.chinese: 全部采用进口真皮，舒适耐用，气派尊贵。

definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
ostentation/a show of extravagance/grand style/red tape
interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
